long_description: The REI Base Camp 6 Footprint extends the life of your tent by protecting the floor from abrasion and excess wear and tear. Footprint is sized a bit smaller than the tent floor to prevent water from pooling underneath the tent during rainy weather. Color-coding on the webbing stake-outs at the corners allows easy attachment. The REI Base Camp 6 Footprint fits only the 2014 REI Base Camp 6 Tent (sold separately).
short_description: The REI Base Camp 6 Footprint extends the life of your tent by protecting the floor from abrasion and excess wear and tear.
